title: Worse Than Brexit
description: ‘Quitaly.’ ‘Italeave.’ Whatever you call it, Italy’s recent election results are stoking fears that the once staunch supporter of the EU may be the next country to exit. Kate asks Luigi, our resident Italian expert, how we got here and why it matters.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (Chicago Booth Review)
